mapper.select: select t.id,t.order_id,t.cost_code,t.cost_name,t.supplier_id,t.amount,t.cid,t.remarks,t.bill_id,t.status, t1.company_name supplierName, t2.currency_code,t2.currency_name from order_cope_with t LEFT JOIN supplier_info t1 on t1.id = t.supplier_id LEFT JOIN currency_info t2 on t2.id = t.cid WHERE t.order_id = #{orderId}

select t.id,t.order_id,t.cost_code,t.cost_name,t.supplier_id,t.amount,t.cid,t.remarks,t.bill_id, t1.company_name supplierName, t2.currency_code,t2.currency_name from order_cope_with t LEFT JOIN supplier_info t1 on t1.id = t.supplier_id LEFT JOIN currency_info t2 on t2.id = t.cid where t.order_id = #{orderId, jdbcType=BIGINT} and t.bill_id = #{billId, jdbcType=BIGINT}
